name: gold (beta)
description:
You're Buddy, a skilled archer of the Dank Discordians. You set out to find more territory to invade, and the territory you discover is the Empire. You have to explore the mysterious Empire city, and crossing paths with kindred spirits in the process.

"Sometimes, terrains are best unseen; lying in the pit of indiscovery." Controls
  • Arrow keys to move around
  • ESC to view your and your party's stats
  • Spacebar to interact with characters and seemingly out-of-the-ordinary things
Credits

frostybirdy - Stygian Norishima, Frost
mayuniki- Hae Min Yeong (the little buddy referred to by Frost in the first interaction)
Toilet-Bound-1 - Hinge Okina (birdboy)
AudTrico - Aud Runaki (character you can invite to your party in the first interaction)
shnailmail - Misu (scientist-looking character)
RavenAikoMoon - Raven (suit wearer by the seaside), Jacob (guy in Chatter House)
KiwiTime - Xander and Mao (two boys by the seaside)

more to come

* as of August 16, 2022, there is not a Mac, Linux or Android version of gold. My sincerest apologies <3
